title: Revive Aromatherapy All Natural Spray
description: Autism-Products.com presents Revive Aromatherapy All Natural Spray! Made with Peppermint W/Yang Ylang. No harmful ingredients. Gentle yet effective. Shake well and spray liberally around the room. External use only. Safe for use around children and pets. Avoid eyes.
